message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. Is this something you'd like to consider?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product might be high, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $15000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $16500. I believe the product's value is worth it, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Given my financial situation, I would like to propose a price of $14500. I hope this is within your range and allows us to reach an agreement.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with $14500. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll propose a price of $16000. This is my final offer for now, and I hope we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your efforts in adjusting the price, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $15500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to come to an agreement.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'll meet you at $16250. This is my last offer, and I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $15750. I hope this is within your range and allows us to reach an agreement.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll meet you at $16500 one last time. If not, I'll have to explore other options. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $16000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
